api_list.api_description: Conditionally requests user for an input, and returns their input or a predefined message stating no user input is required for answering the query.

required_parameters.name: requires_input
required_parameters.description: A flag to determine if user input is needed (1) or not (0)

optional_parameters.name: input_question
optional_parameters.description: The question to ask the user to gather more information for answering the query

query: I want to create a countdown timer for an upcoming event. Can you provide me with the current date and time? Additionally, I would like to know the date and time one month before the event.

api_list.api_description: Conditionally requests user for an input, and returns their input or a predefined message stating no user input is required for answering the query.

required_parameters.name: requires_input
required_parameters.description: A flag to determine if user input is needed (1) or not (0)

optional_parameters.name: input_question
optional_parameters.description: The question to ask the user to gather more information for answering the query

query: Could you please give me the latest price for Gasohol E85 and Hi Premium 97 Gasohol 95? I'm also looking for an image that displays the result for today's price.

api_list.api_description: Conditionally requests user for an input, and returns their input or a predefined message stating no user input is required for answering the query.

required_parameters.name: requires_input
required_parameters.description: A flag to determine if user input is needed (1) or not (0)

optional_parameters.name: input_question
optional_parameters.description: The question to ask the user to gather more information for answering the query

query: I'm planning a family vacation and I need to know the last day of each month for the next six months. Can you provide me with a list of these dates? Additionally, I would like to know the number of years, months, days, hours, and minutes until our vacation starts.

api_list.api_description: Conditionally requests user for an input, and returns their input or a predefined message stating no user input is required for answering the query.

required_parameters.name: requires_input
required_parameters.description: A flag to determine if user input is needed (1) or not (0)

optional_parameters.name: input_question
optional_parameters.description: The question to ask the user to gather more information for answering the query

query: My friends and I are planning a road trip, and we're curious about the current prices of Diesel B10, Gasohol 91, and ULG. Could you fetch the price change from the previous update? Additionally, it would be great if you could provide an image with the latest prices.

api_list.api_description: Gets image, video, and audio data sent by users.

api_list.api_name: Get rich menu ID of user
api_list.api_description: Gets the ID of the rich menu linked to a user.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: User ID. Found in the source object of webhook event objects. Do not use the LINE ID used in LINE.

api_list.api_description: Downloads an image associated with a rich menu.

required_parameters.name: richMenuId
required_parameters.description: ID of the rich menu with the image to be downloaded

api_list.api_description: Gets a list of all uploaded rich menus.
Gets a rich menu via a rich menu ID.

required_parameters.name: richMenuId
required_parameters.description: ID of an uploaded rich menu

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: User ID that is returned in a webhook event object. Do not use the LINE ID found on LINE.

api_list.api_description: Gets the ID of the default rich menu set with the Messaging API.

api_list.api_name: Get number of sent reply messages
api_list.api_description: Gets the number of messages sent with the /bot/message/reply endpoint.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Date the messages were sent. Format: yyyyMMdd (Example: 20191231) Timezone: UTC+9

api_list.api_description: Conditionally requests user for an input, and returns their input or a predefined message stating no user input is required for answering the query.

required_parameters.name: requires_input
required_parameters.description: A flag to determine if user input is needed (1) or not (0)

optional_parameters.name: input_question
optional_parameters.description: The question to ask the user to gather more information for answering the query

query: I want to know the number of messages sent using the /bot/message/reply endpoint on January 1, 2022. Also, please give me the ID of the rich menu linked to a user with the user ID 'U987654321'.
relevant APIs: Get number of sent reply messages
Get rich menu ID of user
